journey.name: Diving into Tech
journey.altText: Image of a laptop with calender and coffee, representing career transition into technology
journey.description: Why and how I found my way into Tech and what it has really meant.

journey.name: Building DailyHealth — a small, personal app
journey.altText: Image of a space with a computer, yoga mat, plant and sunlight coming in through the window.
journey.description: A small personal app for mindful routines with a sprinkle of AI.

journey.name: Can you love code?
journey.altText: Image showing a table with tea, a womans hand writing, A very contemplative mood.
journey.description: Sometimes I wonder — does coding have to be your whole life to count as a passion?

journey.name: Career Week just kicked off at Technigo
journey.altText: Celebration scene with confetti and a ballon, representing bootcamp milestone achievement
journey.description: Two full weeks of React ahead.

journey.name: Freelance project - Wordpress
journey.altText: Image showing a desk with a laptop, pens, a cup of coffee and a calendar.
journey.description: Lessons from a real-world WordPress project — SEO, accessibility & performance.

journey.name: Accessibility - 4 fixes
journey.altText: An image showing a desk of a team or group working on accessibility with computers, headphones and coffee with snacks.

journey.name: Bootcamp coming to an end
journey.altText: An image with a text in white saying, the journey is on marking that the journey begins after the bootcamp.

journey.name: Remote - what it takes to show up online
journey.altText: An image representing remote work from home, a desk with at laptop on zoom with a cup of coffee
journey.description: Reflections and thoughts around working remotley.

journey.name: Tips and Tricks on accessibility for entrepreneurs
journey.altText: An image of a laptop, with a blu desk, a pink book that says goals goals goals and a cup of coffee
journey.description: Tips and tricks on accessibility for entrepreneurs.
